title: Visualizing biological sequences with gt
text: R package developed part 2025 posit table contest. See submission details. Traditionally, analysis related biological sequences multiple sequence alignment (MSA) done standalone software programs like Jalview, Rasmol, many others, online web apps like NCBI’s msa viewer. Recent additions like ggmsa, Bioconductor’s msa, among others, brought visualization analysis R ecosystem. sequences often visualized table packages like gt. package facilitates bringing traditional bioinformatic activities R gt.

title: Visualizing biological sequences with gt
text: can install development version gtseq GitHub :

title: Visualizing biological sequences with gt
text: gtseq provides several functions help create gt tables biological sequences. Use gtseq data.frame column containing amino acid sequences: customization use lower-level functions: split_sequences structuring data gt apply_color_to_aa coloring amino acids one included palettes get_consensus adding consensus sequence frequency data
